Dead by Daylight ist ein absolut empfehlenswertes Game, mit dem ich sowohl an dem PC, auf der PS4 und der Switch schon einige Stunden verbracht habe. 
Vor einigen Jahren habe ich ein Gameplay von DbD bei einem bekannten Youtuber verfolgt und mir war sofort klar, dass ich mir das Spiel zulegen muss. Ich habe mir recht viel versprochen und wurde nicht enttäuscht. Die Entwiclung, die das Game durchgemacht hat, ist wirklich grandios. Die Entwickler lassen sich immer wieder tolle Sachen einfallen, um das Spielerlebnis zu intensivieren. Als ich damals begonnen habe zu spielen, konnte ich die Spannung, die bei der Bearbeitung von Generatoren aufkommt, kaum aushalten. Sobald das Herzklopfen im Game aufgekommen ist, klopfte auch mein Herz bis zum Hals. Klar, nach vielen Stunden Spielspaß, ist die Aufregung nicht mehr so groß und man ist geübt in dem was man tut und trotzdem habe ich keinen Moment weniger Spaß als noch vor Jahren.
Dead by Daylight ist jetzt kein Titel, den ich jeden Abend über Stunden spiele, aber zwischendurch lassen sich immer wieder ein paar Killer- oder Überlebendenrunden einbauen.
Ich hoffe die Entwickler bleiben weiter dran und überraschen uns weiterhin mit tollen Inhalten.

Notes: It's a game where you have to escape from an OP killer with Noed and mori which one hit kills you, you play with 3 other survivors, you fix 5 gens, activate the exit gates and escape while juggling between being chased by the killer, rescuing people from hooks and hiding behind a tree until the killer leaves the generator. Simple enough right? wrong! you're going to get one hit killed and tunneled and camped so prepare to rage, the game is usually very hard for survivors even if the killers don't tunnel and camp you, you gotta learn how to juke the killer how to hide efficiently, it will take along time to master the game so be prepared. anyways now the killer, at low ranks you gonna have a blast, most survivors don't know  how to run away so just easily down and hook them, don't camp it's not nice, after awhile you'll reach higher ranks and you'll encounter SWF (Survive with Friends) and they are going to wreck you with pallet looping and flashlights so be prepared when that happens take good addons and offerings you have alot of them and most of them are op, just don't take mori please it's a cheap kill that gives you less xp/bloodpoints, you can pretty much use any killer most of them are good, so yeah, now maybe you're asking if you should buy DLC? yeah probably you'll get survivors, killers and perks just buy them at a discount they are quite frequent and make the DLCS cheap as heck, you'll need a couple of DLC characters if you're planning to complete some challenges that award bloodpoints and points to the battlepass, yes you heard me right there is a battle pass, you'll pretty much won't get anything from the free section so you'll have to buy the premium battlepass which costs 10$ and is quite worth it because it pretty much gives you around 20 skins for a price of one, that will be all good luck to you in dead by daylight and don't take mori please thank you.

The general idea of this game is great. In execution, however, it leaves a lot to be desired. For one, matchmaking is terrible. You either get a group of noobs matched up with a veteran killer, or a group of experienced survivors matched against a noob killer. There's unfortunately no other way around it. And when it's the former, the experienced killers are more than happy to just grief the survivors, making the experience far less than fun. Oh, and not to mention the ridiculous amount of time that you get to spend waiting for a game when trying to play as a killer, only to then be matched up with veterans who just loop you to no end and then talk shit to you in chat. Seriously, this game is completely broken and no fun to those who just got started with it. If they ever fix these issues then I'm sure the game would be a lot of fun, but as it stands it's not likely this will ever happen considering the game is more than 4 years old now. And when you complain to the devs, they tell you to just play a different game. I'd recommend everyone heed that advice and don't waste your money on this one.
